channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 77 – Brighton
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... I like it that you feel comfortable saying that knowing that no one who cares about this will ever read this blog :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… I like it that you feel comfortable saying that knowing that no one who cares about this will ever read this blog :)

item.title: By: udim
item.dc:creator: udim
item.description: "Today was one of those days that when I try to think back what I did" That sounds like me every day during the scrum meeting. :)
item.content:encoded:
“Today was one of those days that when I try to think back what I did”
That sounds like me every day during the scrum meeting. :)
